titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to prohibit bills and resolutions from containing more than a single subject when they are presented to the President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits bills and joint resolutions containing more than a single subject from being presented to the President.
